actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the protection of U.S. magistrates by amending title 18, United States Code, to include U.S. magistrates within the coverage of section 1114.

summary.text: Includes United States magistrates within the provisions of Federal law enumerating the criminal penalties for murder or manslaughter of an official of the United States in the performance of such official's duties.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the protection of U.S. magistrates by amending title 18, United States Code, to include U.S. magistrates within the coverage of section 1114.
